'''House Serrett''' is a vassal house that holds fealty to [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. Their [[Silverhill|lands]] are located in the woodlands southeast of [[Casterly Rock]] and south of [[Deep Den]].<ref>[http://wicnet.tumblr.com/post/22725243446 Screenshots establishing the existance of House Serrett in the series]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the House Serrett are the Lords of Silverhill. Their sigil is a male peacock in his pride on a field of cream. Their words are ''I Have No Rival''.
sections.History:
===[[Season 2]]===

Lord Serrett is mentioned in a letter on [[Tywin Lannister]]'s table at [[Harrenhal]] on troop movements.<ref>"[[The Old Gods and the New]]"</ref>
